entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
